mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_IDX, RES_IDX, BOARD_NO, REVIEW_MEM_ID, REVIEW_DATE, SCORE, REVIEW_CONTENT FROM REVIEW WHERE RES_IDX=#{RES_IDX} AND REVIEW_MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_IDX, RES_IDX, BOARD_NO, REVIEW_MEM_ID, REVIEW_DATE, SCORE, REVIEW_CONTENT ) VALUES ( REVIEW_IDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{RES_IDX}, #{BOARD_NO}, #{MEM_ID}, SYSDATE, #{SCORE}, #{REVIEW_CONTENT} )
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_IDX, RES_IDX, BOARD_NO, REVIEW_MEM_ID, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') REVIEW_DATE, SCORE, REVIEW_CONTENT FROM REVIEW WHERE BOARD_NO=#{BOARD_NO}
